Title: Relates to notice requirements for bed bug infestation on rental residential premises
Summary: Requires landlords to notify adjoining units of a beg bug infestation in a rental residential premises without identifying information, and to notify all tenants of an infestation in a common area by posting such notice in a conspicuous location accessible to all tenants.
LawCode: Amd ยง235-j, RP L (as proposed in S.9227 & A.9329)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to notice to certain tenants of a bed bug infestation in residential rental premises
